data.name: Slaking

abilities.name: Lazy Paunch
abilities.text: If Slaking used any attacks during your last turn, Slaking can't attack.

attacks.name: Best Dash
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Slaking by attacks is increased by 50 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: The world's laziest Pokémon. When it is lounging, it is actually saving energy for striking back.

data.name: Slaking

attacks.name: Pitch
attacks.text: Your opponent switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: The world's laziest Pokémon. It moves to another spot when there's no food left within its reach.

abilities.name: Lazy Aura
abilities.text: As long as Slaking is your Active Pokémon, any damage done by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon-ex is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

abilities.name: Lazy
abilities.text: As long as Slaking is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Pokémon can't use any Poké-Powers.

attacks.name: Critical Move
attacks.text: Discard a basic Energy card attached to Slaking or this attack does nothing. Slaking can't attack during your next turn.

abilities.name: Lazy
abilities.text: As long as Slaking is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Pokémon can't use any Poké-Powers.

attacks.name: Critical Move
attacks.text: Discard a basic Energy card attached to Slaking or this attack does nothing. Slaking can't attack during your next turn.

data.name: Slaking

abilities.name: Energetic Impulse
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Slaking is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, Slaking's Lazy Blow attack's base damage is 130 during this turn. If tails, Slaking can't attack or retreat during this turn. (If Slaking is no longer your Active Pokémon, this effect ends.)

data.flavorText: The world's laziest Pokémon. When it is lounging, it is actually saving energy for striking back.

data.name: Slaking

attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Knuckle Sandwich
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: The world's laziest Pokémon. It moves to another spot when there's no food left within its reach.

data.name: Slaking

abilities.name: Unobservant
abilities.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Crushing Blow
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

data.flavorText: The world's laziest Pokémon. When it is lounging, it is actually saving energy for striking back.

data.name: Slaking

abilities.name: Lazy
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Pokémon in play have no Abilities, except for Lazy.

attacks.name: Critical Move
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon. It can't attack during your next turn.

data.flavorText: It is the world's most slothful Pokémon. However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.

data.name: Slaking

abilities.name: Counterattack
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 4 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dynamic Swing
attacks.text: You may do 100 more damage. If you do, during your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 100 more damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: The world's laziest Pokémon. It moves to another spot when there's no food left within its reach.

data.name: Slaking

abilities.name: Act Freely
abilities.text: If a Stadium is in play, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Rout
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It is the world's most slothful Pokémon. However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.

data.name: Slaking V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Kinda Lazy
abilities.text: If you have exactly 2, 4, or 6 Prize cards remaining, this Pokémon can't attack.

data.name: Slaking V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Kinda Lazy
abilities.text: If you have exactly 2, 4, or 6 Prize cards remaining, this Pokémon can't attack.

data.name: Slaking

abilities.name: Stir and Snooze
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is Asleep, flip 2 coins instead of 1 during Pokémon Checkup. If either of them is tails, this Pokémon is still Asleep.

data.flavorText: It is the world's most slothful Pokémon. However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.

data.name: Slaking ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Born to Slack
abilities.text: If your opponent has no Pokémon ex or Pokémon V in play, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Great Swing
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.
